page.title: 06The Village School
page.content: I started school in 1978. The School is a light and airy new building opened by Lord Cornwallis in 1971. It replaced a Victorian School on a different site where now houses have been built. My impression of school is of a very friendly and happy place and I've enjoyed the seven years I've spent there. I have known most of the children in my class since Playgroup and some even before. School starts at 9 am and we usually begin with assembly followed by Maths for the Juniors. Other subjects may include Geography, English, History, Science and Handwriting. Sometimes a mum will come in to school to do things with groups of children; cooking, computer programming, sewing and reading.
